meanings.definition: Antimetabolics: substances that interfere with the metabolism of cells, especially cancer cells.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed antimetabolics to slow down the growth of cancer cells.
meanings.sent2: Researchers are studying the effects of antimetabolics on different types of cancer.
meanings.sent3: The antimetabolics decided to throw a party inside the cancer cells, disrupting their usual activities.
meanings.sent4: The antimetabolics acted like spies, infiltrating the secret operations of the cancer cells.
meanings.sent5: In the battle against cancer, antimetabolics are the silent warriors fighting within the cells.
